languages.text: "Просто имя, которое ему подходит. Ты ведь уже заметил, что имена полны лжи, Паскаль Ханейманн?" {n}Из уст херетека раздается издевательский смех.{/n}
"It is simply a name that fits him. You must have noticed by now that names are full of lies, haven't you, Pasqal Haneumann?" {n}Mocking laughter bursts from the heretek's lips.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Просто имя, которое ему подходит. Ты ведь уже заметил, что имена полны лжи, Паскаль Ханейманн?" {n}Из уст херетека раздается издевательский смех.{/n}

languages.text: 「それは単に彼に似合う名前というだけだ。名前が嘘にまみれている、などということにはそろそろ気づいているはずだ。そうだろう、パスカル・ヘニュマン？」{n}嘲るような笑い声が異端技術の唇から飛び出す。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is simply a name that fits him. You must have noticed by now that names are full of lies, haven't you, Pasqal Haneumann?" {n}Mocking laughter bursts from the heretek's lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「それは単に彼に似合う名前というだけだ。名前が嘘にまみれている、などということにはそろそろ気づいているはずだ。そうだろう、パスカル・ヘニュマン？」{n}嘲るような笑い声が異端技術の唇から飛び出す。{/n}
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: “这不过只是个名字，很适合他。名字里充满了谎言，你现在肯定已经注意到了吧，帕斯卡·哈努曼？”{n}德曼兹发出了冷嘲热讽的笑声。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is simply a name that fits him. You must have noticed by now that names are full of lies, haven't you, Pasqal Haneumann?" {n}Mocking laughter bursts from the heretek's lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这不过只是个名字，很适合他。名字里充满了谎言，你现在肯定已经注意到了吧，帕斯卡·哈努曼？”{n}德曼兹发出了冷嘲热讽的笑声。{/n}
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: "Es ist schlichtweg ein Name, der zu ihm passt. Ihr müsst doch inzwischen bemerkt haben, dass Namen voller Lügen stecken, oder nicht, Pasqal Haneumann?" {n}Der Häretekt lacht spöttisch.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is simply a name that fits him. You must have noticed by now that names are full of lies, haven't you, Pasqal Haneumann?" {n}Mocking laughter bursts from the heretek's lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Es ist schlichtweg ein Name, der zu ihm passt. Ihr müsst dich inzwischen bemerkt haben, dass Namen voller Lügen stecken, oder nicht, Pasqal Haneumann?" {n}Der Häretekt lacht spöttisch.{/n}
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: « Il s'agit simplement d'un nom qui lui correspond. Depuis le temps, vous avez dû remarquer à quel point les noms peuvent être mensongers, n'est-ce pas, Pasqal Haneumann ? » {n}Un rire moqueur s'échappe des lèvres de l'hérétek.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is simply a name that fits him. You must have noticed by now that names are full of lies, haven't you, Pasqal Haneumann?" {n}Mocking laughter bursts from the heretek's lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Il s'agit simplement d'un nom qui lui correspond. Depuis le temps, vous avez dû remarquer à quel point les noms peuvent être mensongers, n'est-ce pas, Pasqal Haneumann ? » {n}Un rire moqueur s'échappe des lèvres de l'hérétek.{/n}
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: «Es simplemente un nombre apropiado para él. A estas alturas ya te habrás dado cuenta de que los nombres son una mentira, ¿no es así, Pasqal Haneumann?». {n}Una carjacada burlona brota de los labios del heretek.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is simply a name that fits him. You must have noticed by now that names are full of lies, haven't you, Pasqal Haneumann?" {n}Mocking laughter bursts from the heretek's lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Es simplemente un nombre apropiado para él. A estas alturas ya te habrás dado cuenta de que los nombres son una mentira, ¿no es así, Pasqal Haneumann?». {n}Una carjacada burlona brota de los labios del heretek.{/n}
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: "Ona yakışan bir isim sadece. Pasqal Haneumann, isimlerde ne yalan ifadeler geçtiğini şimdiye dek fark etmişsindir." {n}Tekâfirin dudaklarından alaycı bir kahkaha yükseliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is simply a name that fits him. You must have noticed by now that names are full of lies, haven't you, Pasqal Haneumann?" {n}Mocking laughter bursts from the heretek's lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ona yakışan bir isim sadece. İsimlerin yalan dolu olduklarını şimdiye dek fark etmişsindir, değil mi Pasqal Haneumann?" {n}Tekâfirin dudaklarından alaycı bir kahkaha yükseliyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements
